page.title: 09FARMING AND CROPS
page.content: In Catterline there are thirteen farms. Barley is the main crop. Oil seed rape is becoming more and more popular every year. This year which is 1985, the farmers have about five times as much of this crop. Many farmers this year are planting potatoes and using them for seed and selling. Turnips are not quite so popular this year having been taken over by the oil seed rape. Silage is still being grown every year. Wheat isn't so popular as it used to be. Some of the fields are being used for housing. Harvest time will soon be here again.
